程序包 control.PersonalSchedule

类 ScheduleController

java.lang.Object
control.Controller
control.PersonalSchedule.ScheduleController
public class ScheduleController
extends Controller
This class is inherited from Controller
This class mainly focus on the process of switching the page, delete the course and update the data in json.
从以下版本开始:
2021/5/12
版本:
2.0
作者:
Xinyu Zhou

      public static void generateClass() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • generateCoursePanel

      public static javax.swing.JPanel generateCoursePanel​(int j, int i) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      generate a specific course JPanel.
      参数:
      i - the row of the course panel.
      j - the column of the course panel.
      返回:
      JPanel
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • isfuture

      private static boolean isfuture​(java.lang.String date) throws java.text.ParseException
      judge the date is after today
      参数:
      date - The date to be judged
      返回:
      boolean
      抛出:
      java.text.ParseException

    • setSchedule

      public static void setSchedule​(int slot, int day, javax.swing.JPanel course)
      update all the course JPanels in the classPanelArray.
      参数:
      slot - the row of the course JPanel.
      day - The column of the course JPanel.
      course - the course Panel with user and coach information.

    • generateDate

      public static javax.swing.JPanel generateDate()
      generate the JPanel for the date on the top of the schedule.
      返回:
      JPanel

    • getWeek

      public static int getWeek​(java.util.Calendar c, java.lang.String[] dayOfWeek)
      update the date information in the date array and return the location of today's date.
      参数:
      c - Calendar.
      dayOfWeek - a string array which contain 7 dates for the date JPanel.
      返回:
      int

    • findCourse

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Course> findCourse​(java.lang.String date, int slot) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      check the course.json to find the course match the login client role and the time of the course.
      参数:
      date - the date of the course.
      slot - the row of the course JPanel.
      返回:
      ArrayList
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • getTelenum

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTelenum​(java.lang.String date, int slot) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
